info.name: Dark Theme - (new) Blogger
info.description:
A dark theme for New Blogger.
It does include stuff for their old theme, but that serves more like an anti flash bang in case you accidently opened the old theme.

Specials:
- HTML Editor after Notepad++ Deep Black XML style
- Semi-Easy adjustment for your personal taste since it's only using 6 colors
- Some smaller spacing improvements that I thought were useful


Tags: Dark Theme, Dark Mode, Blogger, New Blogger, Blogspot, New Blogspot, Clean, Purple,
info.additionalInfo:
Known Issues:

New Blogger:
- Some numbers on the New Stat Graph can't be changed
- Search Bar is vanilla

Old Blogger:
- Old Post Creation background is white (it's using html as ID so changing it currently breaks a lot)
- Old Buttons are a bit scuffed here and there
- Old Search Bar is vanilla


Changelog:
06/25/20 Added Image/Video Insert Box
06/26/20 Old Buttons, Old Dropdowns, Settings Tab for both and Minor Improvements/Fixes
